https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/ot7kANkeRrjvTbYwHTfQgr1GQCf.jpg Upon learning that her uncle sold her Mom's vintage convertible -- a car full of Christmas memories -- Ashley enlists the help of her uncle's attorney, Duncan, to get it back. Christmas on Wheels
